title: MCA Extends Annual Filing Deadline for FY 2024-25 to January 31, 2026
content:
# MCA Extends Annual Filing Deadline for FY 2024-25 to January 31, 2026

Ek important update hai for all companies and professionals! The Ministry of Corporate Affairs (MCA) ne Financial Year 2024-25 ke annual filings ke liye deadline extend kar di hai.

Government ne General Circular No. 08/2025 dated December 30, 2025, ke through yeh announcement kiya hai.

**Key Details:**

*   **Financial Year Affected:** FY 2024-25.
*   **Previous Extended Due Date:** December 31, 2025 (as per General Circular No. 06/2025 dated October 17, 2025).
*   **New Due Date:** Companies can now complete their annual filings without additional fees up to **January 31, 2026**.
*   **Forms Covered:** This relaxation applies to e-Forms MGT-7, MGT-7A, AOC-4, AOC-4 CFS, AOC-4 NBFC (Ind AS), AOC-4 CFS NBFC (Ind AS), and AOC-4 (XBRL).
*   **Important Clarification:** Please note, this extension **does not** extend the statutory due date for holding Annual General Meetings (AGMs) under the Companies Act, 2013. Companies still need to adhere to the prescribed timelines for conducting their AGMs.

This extension is a relief for many stakeholders, especially considering the recent deployment of new e-forms on the MCA-21 Version 3 portal.
